verses.verse: And Yisra'EL <WH3478> took his journey <WH5265> <WH8799> with all that he had, and came <WH935> <WH8799> to Be'er-Sheva <WH884>, and offered <WH2076> <WH8799> sacrifices <WH2077> unto the 'Elohim <WH430> of his father <WH1> Yitz'chak <WH3327>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yisra'EL <WH3478> in the visions <WH4759> of the night <WH3915>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Ya`akov <WH3290>, Ya`akov <WH3290>. And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Here am I.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I am 'Elohim <WH410>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of thy father <WH1>: fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not to go down <WH3381> <WH8800> into Egypt <WH4714>; for I will there make <WH7760> <WH8799> of thee a great <WH1419> nation <WH1471>:

I will go down <WH3381> <WH8799> with thee into Egypt <WH4714>; and I will also surely <WH5927> <WH8800> bring thee up <WH5927> <WH8686> again: and Yosef <WH3130> shall put <WH7896> <WH8799> his hand <WH3027> upon thine eyes <WH5869>.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> from Be'er-Sheva <WH884>: and the sons <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> carried <WH5375> <WH8799> Ya`akov <WH3290> their father <WH1>, and their little ones <WH2945>, and their wives <WH802>, in the wagons <WH5699> which Pharaoh <WH6547> had sent <WH7971> <WH8804> to carry <WH5375> <WH8800> him.

And they took <WH3947> <WH8799> their cattle <WH4735>, and their goods <WH7399>, which they had gotten <WH7408> <WH8804> in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> into Egypt <WH4714>, Ya`akov <WH3290>, and all his seed <WH2233> with him:

His sons <WH1121>, and his sons <WH1121> ' sons <WH1121> with him, his daughters <WH1323>, and his sons <WH1121> ' daughters <WH1323>, and all his seed <WH2233> brought he <WH935> <WH8689> with him into Egypt <WH4714>.

And these are the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, which came <WH935> <WH8802> into Egypt <WH4714>, Ya`akov <WH3290> and his sons <WH1121>: Re'uven <WH7205>, Ya`akov's <WH3290> firstborn <WH1060>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Re'uven <WH7205>; Hanoch <WH2585>, and Phallu <WH6396>, and Hezron <WH2696>, and Karmi <WH3756>.

And the sons <WH1121> of SHim`on <WH8095>; Jemuel <WH3223>, and Jamin <WH3226>, and Ohad <WH161>, and Jachin <WH3199>, and Zohar <WH6714>, and Shaul <WH7586> the son <WH1121> of a Kanahanitish <WH3669> woman.
And the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>; Gershon <WH1648>, K'hat <WH6955>, and M'rari <WH4847>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Y'hudah <WH3063>; Er <WH6147>, and Onan <WH209>, and Shelah <WH7956>, and Pharez <WH6557>, and Zerah <WH2226>: but Er <WH6147> and Onan <WH209> died <WH4191> <WH8799> in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>. And the sons <WH1121> of Pharez <WH6557> were Hezron <WH2696> and Hamul <WH2538>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Yissakhar <WH3485>; Tola <WH8439>, and Phuvah <WH6312>, and I-yov <WH3102>, and Shimron <WH8110>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Z'vulun <WH2074>; Sered <WH5624>, and Elon <WH356>, and YAHleel <WH3177>.

These be the sons <WH1121> of Leah <WH3812>, which she bare <WH3205> <WH8804> unto Ya`akov <WH3290> in Padanaram <WH6307>, with his daughter <WH1323> Dinah <WH1783>: all the souls <WH5315> of his sons <WH1121> and his daughters <WH1323> were thirty <WH7970> and three <WH7969>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410>; Ziphion <WH6837>, and Haggi <WH2291>, Shuni <WH7764>, and Ezbon <WH675>, Eri <WH6179>, and Arodi <WH722>, and Areli <WH692>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Asher <WH836>; Jimnah <WH3232>, and Ishuah <WH3438>, and Isui <WH3440>, and Beriah <WH1283>, and Serah <WH8294> their sister <WH269>: and the sons <WH1121> of Beriah <WH1283>; Heber <WH2268>, and Malchiel <WH4439>.

These are the sons <WH1121> of Zilpah <WH2153>, whom Laban <WH3837> gave <WH5414> <WH8804> to Leah <WH3812> his daughter <WH1323>, and these she bare <WH3205> <WH8799> unto Ya`akov <WH3290>, even sixteen <WH6240> <WH8337> souls <WH5315>.
The sons <WH1121> of Rachel <WH7354> Ya`akov's <WH3290> wife <WH802>; Yosef <WH3130>, and Binyamin <WH1144>.

And unto Yosef <WH3130> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> were born <WH3205> <WH8735> M'nasheh <WH4519> and Efrayim <WH669>, which Asenath <WH621> the daughter <WH1323> of Potipherah <WH6319> Kohen <WH3548> of On <WH204> bare <WH3205> <WH8804> unto him.

And the sons <WH1121> of Binyamin <WH1144> were Belah <WH1106>, and Becher <WH1071>, and Ashbel <WH788>, Gera <WH1617>, and Naaman <WH5283>, Ehi <WH278>, and Rosh <WH7220>, Muppim <WH4649>, and Huppim <WH2650>, and Ard <WH714>.
These are the sons <WH1121> of Rachel <WH7354>, which were born <WH3205> <WH8795> to Ya`akov <WH3290>: all the souls <WH5315> were fourteen <WH702> <WH6240>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835>; Hushim <WH2366>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Naftali <WH5321>; YAHzeel <WH3183>, and Guni <WH1476>, and Jezer <WH3337>, and Shillem <WH8006>.

These are the sons <WH1121> of Bilhah <WH1090>, which Laban <WH3837> gave <WH5414> <WH8804> unto Rachel <WH7354> his daughter <WH1323>, and she bare <WH3205> <WH8799> these unto Ya`akov <WH3290>: all the souls <WH5315> were seven <WH7651>.

All the souls <WH5315> that came <WH935> <WH8802> with Ya`akov <WH3290> into Egypt <WH4714>, which came out <WH3318> <WH8802> of his loins <WH3409>, besides Ya`akov's <WH3290> sons <WH1121> ' wives <WH802>, all the souls <WH5315> were threescore <WH8346> and six <WH8337>;

And the sons <WH1121> of Yosef <WH3130>, which were born <WH3205> <WH8795> him in Egypt <WH4714>, were two <WH8147> souls <WH5315>: all the souls <WH5315> of the house <WH1004> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, which came <WH935> <WH8802> into Egypt <WH4714>, were threescore and ten <WH7657>.

And he sent <WH7971> <WH8804> Y'hudah <WH3063> before him <WH6440> unto Yosef <WH3130>, to direct <WH3384> <WH8687> his face <WH6440> unto Goshen <WH1657>; and they came <WH935> <WH8799> into the land <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657>.

And Yosef <WH3130> made ready <WH631> <WH8799> his chariot <WH4818>, and went up <WH5927> <WH8799> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> Yisra'EL <WH3478> his father <WH1>, to Goshen <WH1657>, and presented <WH7200> <WH8735> himself unto him; and he fell <WH5307> <WH8799> on his neck <WH6677>, and wept <WH1058> <WH8799> on his neck <WH6677> a good while <WH5750>.

And Yisra'EL <WH3478> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yosef <WH3130>, Now <WH6471> let me die <WH4191> <WH8799>, since <WH310> I have seen <WH7200> <WH8800> thy face <WH6440>, because thou art yet <WH5750> alive <WH2416>.

And Yosef <WH3130> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his brethren <WH251>, and unto his father's <WH1> house <WH1004>, I will go up <WH5927> <WH8799>, and shew <WH5046> <WH8686> Pharaoh <WH6547>, and say <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, My brethren <WH251>, and my father's <WH1> house <WH1004>, which were in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, are come <WH935> <WH8804> unto me;

And the men <WH582> are shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802> <WH6629>, for their trade hath been to feed cattle <WH4735>; and they have brought <WH935> <WH8689> their flocks <WH6629>, and their herds <WH1241>, and all that they have.
And it shall come to pass, when Pharaoh <WH6547> shall call <WH7121> <WH8799> you, and shall say <WH559> <WH8804>, What is your occupation <WH4639> ?

That ye shall say <WH559> <WH8804>, Thy servants <WH5650> ' trade <WH582> hath been about cattle <WH4735> from our youth <WH5271> even until now, both we, and also our fathers <WH1>: that ye may dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> in the land <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657>; for every shepherd <WH7462> <WH8802> <WH6629> is an abomination <WH8441> unto the Egyptians <WH4714>.
